thread.title: Uri Geller's statue vanishes - as if by magic
thread.title_full: Uri Geller's statue vanishes - as if by magic | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Uri Geller's statue vanishes - as if by magic
text:
Play video A controversial statue commissioned by famous spoon bender Uri Geller has vanished - just a week after its unveiling. The statue of the bent spoon caused some controversy on the Thames Towpath in Sonning. Wokingham Borough Council said it hadn't received the necessary planning permission. The statue has not been reported stolen to police.
Last updated Fri 16 Oct 2015 Entertainment magic
